SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE) AS FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , Q.QC_SE , GAM_GET_QC_SE_NM(Q.QC_SE) QC_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_TP , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_TP_NM(Q.QC_INSP_TP) QC_INSP_TP_NM , Q.QC_INSP_SE , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_SE_NM(Q.QC_INSP_SE) QC_INSP_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , Q.QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , Q.RM FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q INNER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F F ON Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND Q.QC_MNG_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcMngNm# || '%'
AND Q.QC_SE = #sQcSe#
AND Q.ENFORCE_YEAR = #sEnforceYear#
ORDER BY F.PRT_AT_CODE , Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , Q.QC_MNG_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND Q.QC_MNG_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcMngNm# || '%'
AND Q.QC_SE = #sQcSe#
AND Q.ENFORCE_YEAR = #sEnforceYear#

SELECT Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , F.PRT_AT_CODE , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', F.PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_CODE_NM , F.OWNER , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.RM FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q INNER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F F ON Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND Q.QC_MNG_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcMngNm# || '%'
AND Q.QC_SE = #sQcSe#
AND Q.ENFORCE_YEAR = #sEnforceYear#
ORDER BY F.PRT_AT_CODE, Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO

SELECT Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE) AS FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , Q.QC_SE , GAM_GET_QC_SE_NM(Q.QC_SE) QC_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_TP , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_TP_NM(Q.QC_INSP_TP) QC_INSP_TP_NM , Q.QC_INSP_SE , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_SE_NM(Q.QC_INSP_SE) QC_INSP_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_INSP_AMT, '999,999,999,999') QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , Q.QC_INSP_RESULT , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.RM FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q WHERE Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND Q.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , O.FCLTS_JOB_SE , O.QC_MNG_SEQ , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT G.PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_NO) PRT_FCLTY_NM , O.STTUS_EVL_LVL , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(O.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , TO_CHAR(O.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , O.INSPECTOR , O.QC_INSP_RESULT , O.RM FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F O WHERE O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY O.FCLTS_MNG_NO ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.FCLTS_JOB_SE , F.QC_MNG_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND F.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND F.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , R.FCLTS_JOB_SE , R.QC_MNG_SEQ , R.QC_ITEM_CD , I.QC_ITEM_NM , I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD , (SELECT QC_ITEM_NM FROM QC_ITEM_CD_F WHERE QC_ITEM_CD = I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD) AS QC_ITEM_UPPER_NM , R.SEQ , R.INSP_RESULT_CHK , GAM_GET_INSP_RESULT_CHK_NM(R.INSP_RESULT_CHK) INSP_RESULT_CHK_NM , R.INSP_RESULT_CN FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F R INNER JOIN QC_ITEM_CD_F I ON R.QC_ITEM_CD = I.QC_ITEM_CD WHERE R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND R.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND R.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD, R.SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)
